# Controller Macro Programming

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-macro`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Custom macros and variables

## Capabilities

- Handle macro programming for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller macro programming.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
- When needing controller macro programming capabilities

## Hooks
